docs.abstract: Paul Krugman Op-Ed column examines underlying reasons why most major American pizza companies, like Pizza Hut, aggressively support Republicans; says Big Pizza, subset of Big Food, has been caught up in country's nutrition wars, debate over personal choice and class issues tied to food; contends pizza partisanship is case study in big money, blind ideology and popular prejudice that is leading to decline in effective government.
docs.lead_paragraph: The politics of Big Pizza resemble those of Big Coal or Big Tobacco and tell you a lot about what is happening to American governance in general.
docs.snippet: The politics of Big Pizza resemble those of Big Coal or Big Tobacco and tell you a lot about what is happening to American governance in general.

headline.print_headline: Slash Sugar Intake to Fight Obesity, Tooth Decay: WHO
headline.main: Slash Sugar Intake to Fight Obesity, Tooth Decay: WHO

docs.lead_paragraph: Adults and children from the Americas to Western Europe and the Middle East must roughly halve the amount of sugar they consume to lower risk of obesity and tooth decay, the World Health Organization said on Wednesday.
docs.snippet: Adults and children from the Americas to Western Europe and the Middle East must roughly halve the amount of sugar they consume to lower risk of obesity and tooth decay, the World Health Organization said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: UN: World Eating Too Much Sugar; Cut to 5-10 Percent of Diet
headline.main: UN: World Eating Too Much Sugar; Cut to 5-10 Percent of Diet

docs.lead_paragraph: New guidelines from the World Health Organization are enough to kill anyone's sugar high. The U.N. health agency says the world is eating too much sugar and people should slash their intake to just six to 12 teaspoons per day — an amount that could be exceeded with a single can of soda.
docs.snippet: New guidelines from the World Health Organization are enough to kill anyone's sugar high. The U.N. health agency says the world is eating too much sugar and people should slash their intake to just six to 12 teaspoons per day — an amount that...

headline.main: Full Circle on What’s Best to Eat
